title: Congress Pushes Up Against Deadline To Keep Government Funded
teaser: Congress has just over two days left to pass a spending bill before the government runs out of cash, and lawmakers appear to be pushing it to the wire. So far, no one is worried about an actual shutdown, despite some policy arguments that have delayed completion of the legislation.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
